dashboard.description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/1628915368 at Tue Sep 28 09:14:18 UTC 2021

panels.content:
# GitLab Public Dashboards

Welcome to the GitLab public dashboard. GitLab [values transparency](https://about.gitlab.com/handbook/values/#transparency),
so we maintain a public copy of our internal dashboards.

Our dashboards are managed using Grafonnet, and the source is [publicly available on GitLab.com](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/tree/master/dashboards).

For security reasons, and owing to an TOS violation in which an anonymous user downloaded 8GB/day of metric data for several weeks through our public Grafana instance, we now require all users to log into `dashboards.gitlab.com` with a GitLab.com login.
Note that in order to protect personally identifiable information (PII), and due to stricter query limitations and timeouts on this public instance, not all dashboards will work correctly.

# Useful Links

* **[Platform Triage Dashboard](/d/general-triage/general-platform-triage?orgId=1)** technical overview for all services.
* **[Capacity Planning Dashboard](/d/general-capacity-planning/general-capacity-planning?orgId=1)** resources currently saturated, or at risk of becoming saturated.
* **[Service SLA Dashboard](/d/general-slas/general-slas?orgId=1)** service SLA tracking.
* **[Source repository for these dashboards](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/tree/master/dashboards)** - interested in how we use [grafonnet-lib](https://github.com/grafana/grafonnet-lib)
  to build our dashboards?

This graphs show the frontend services that GitLab customer traffic will be initially handled by. Any issues in this
fleet are more likely to be user-impacting.
panels.title: Help

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: web Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

panels.title: web Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="main",type="web"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="web"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

dashboard.title: general: GitLab Dashboards
